backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining user profiles, travel and monetary data types, access‑controlled CRUD functions, and in‑memory maps for ledger and traveller state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking two features to affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files detailing their purpose across authentication, ledger views, utilities, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Empty stylesheet placeholder for global frontend styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx and defines base page metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication state, profile setup flow, theming, and rendering the ledger page.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header with branding, sync indicator, and user menu including logout that clears identity, query cache, and local storage.
frontend/src/components/AuthGate.tsx: Authentication wrapper showing a login card when unauthenticated and rendering children when logged in.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: Generic empty‑state display with optional icon or illustration and an action button.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal prompting first‑time users to enter and save their name, blocking dismissal until completion.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveTableS: Wrapper providing horizontal scroll support for tables using a ScrollArea component.
frontend/src/components/SyncStatusIndica: Component showing cloud/sync icons and relative time based on current app data sync status.
frontend/src/features/ledger/BackupResto: UI panel to export ledger state to a JSON file and restore backups with confirmation and merge logic.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CarExpenses: Manages car expense entries, auto-toll settings, and manual expense creation with validation and UI dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CashPayment: Dialog form to record a traveller’s cash payment with amount, date, validation, and submission handling.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ClearDataPa: Password-protected panel allowing selective clearing of ledger data categories with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/CoTraveller: Dialog to add income entries from co-travellers with amount/date input, validation, and state updates.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DailyPartic: Renders a grid for marking AM/PM trip participation per traveller, with weekend inclusion, bulk toggles, and save actions. Uses ledger state to manage draft daily trip data.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DateRangePi: Provides a dual-date picker to update the ledger's start and end date range. Uses popover calendars for selecting dates.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCarEx: Confirmation dialog for deleting a car expense, triggering a toast on success. Calls a provided delete callback and closes the dialog.
frontend/src/features/ledger/DeleteCashP: Confirmation dialog for deleting a cash payment for a traveller. Executes a delete callback and shows a toast message.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCarExpe: Dialog for editing a car expense with fields for date, category, amount, and note, including validation. Submits updates and resets when opened.
frontend/src/features/ledger/EditCashPay: Dialog for editing a traveller's cash payment with amount, date, and note fields plus validation. Saves the updated payment and closes on success.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExpenseHist: Wraps ExpenseHistoryView in a dialog allowing users to view and manage car expenses. Displays history filtered by selected date range.
Displays a filterable, searchable, and sortable table of car expenses within the date range. Supports editing and deleting individual expenses.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportButto: Button that opens the export report dialog. Toggles dialog visibility using local state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/ExportRepor: Dialog component for selecting report sections and travellers before exporting ledger data to CSV.
Main ledger page managing tabs, dialogs, syncing, and layout for all ledger features.
frontend/src/features/ledger/LedgerState: Provides React context for accessing and updating the full ledger state and its actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/MobileLedge: Mobile sidebar navigation for switching ledger tabs and opening history or export dialogs.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OtherPendin: Form dialog for adding an additional pending amount to a traveller with validation.
frontend/src/features/ledger/OverallSumm: Computes and displays total income, expenses, profit/loss, and monthly breakdown from ledger data.
frontend/src/features/ledger/PaymentHist: Dialog wrapper displaying the payment history list within the selected date range.
Filters and displays cash payments by traveller and date range, with edit and delete actions.
frontend/src/features/ledger/RatePerTrip: Shows and updates the per‑trip rate with validation and synced input state.
frontend/src/features/ledger/SummaryPane: Computes per‑traveller trip counts, charges, payments, pending amounts, and balances for the selected date range.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TravellerMa: Manages adding, renaming, and deleting travellers, blocking deletion when outstanding balance exists.
frontend/src/features/ledger/TripHistory: Generates a date‑sorted trip history table including regular and co‑traveller income entries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppDataSync.ts: Synchronizes local ledger state with backend data via polling, merge logic, and debounced saves.
frontend/src/hooks/useAutoTollSettings.t: Manages auto toll settings using localStorage with functions to enable/disable and update the toll amount.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLedgerLocalState.t: Stores and manages carpool ledger state in localStorage, including travellers, trips, payments, expenses, and date ranges.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks to fetch and save the current user's profile via an actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining color themes, dark mode variables, and basic table styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/utils/backupRestore.ts: Exports, imports, validates, and merges ledger backup files, ensuring consistent local ledger state handling.
frontend/src/utils/dateRange.ts: Provides date utility functions for formatting and generating weekday ranges, including current week calculation.
frontend/src/utils/exportExcel.ts: Generates CSV-style Excel exports of ledger data, including daily grids and summary calculations.
frontend/src/utils/exportReport.ts: Generates CSV exports for ledger data, including daily grids, summaries, payments, and car expenses based on filters and date range.
frontend/src/utils/ledgerBalances.ts: Computes a traveller’s balance by summing trips, charges, payments, and pending amounts within a date range.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Provides helpers for formatting INR currency values and parsing currency strings.
frontend/src/utils/tripCalculations.ts: Calculates income totals and monthly breakdowns from daily trip data, including optional co‑traveller income.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting hash and query routing.
frontend/src/utils/weekendInclusion.ts: Determines whether weekend dates should be included or editable based on settings or saved trip data.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project goals and features, including daily auto‑toll updates and a trip history screen with date‑range totals.
